Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista® Alkaline Phosphatase Flex reagent cartridge (ALPI)
Dimension Vista® Alkaline Phosphatase Calibrator (ALPI CAL)
Regulation Name(s): Alkaline phosphatase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista® Alkaline Phosphatase Flex reagent cartridge and calibrator for quantitative alkaline phosphatase measurement on the Dimension Vista® System.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of alkaline phosphatase in human serum and plasma for diagnosis and treatment of liver, bone, parathyroid, and intestinal diseases; calibrator for alkaline phosphatase method on Dimension Vista® System.
